pr_title: Scatter3d - allow negative numbers to have logarithmic expansion as well

timeline.message: Allow negative numbers to not just be 0 when logarithmic is done.

timeline.author: cygnus-x-1
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -179,7 +179,7 @@ public void arrange(final GraphWriteMethods wg) throws InterruptedException {
     private float scaleValue(float value, boolean logarithmic) {

timeline.bodyText: You could do this in one operation using Math.log10(Math.abs(value)) * Math.signum(value).
timeline.author: cygnus-x-1

replies.bodyText:
Hmm, I actually broke it with the request :(
log10(0) = -Infinity is the thing I want to avoid.
replies.author: spjspj

replies.bodyText: Seems that log10(0) * 0 still gives NaN so kept the 0.0 case in.
replies.author: CrucisGamma

timeline.message:
Allow negative numbers to not just be 0 when logarithmic is done.

This accounts for Math.log10(0) * 0 ==> NaN still.
